channel.title: Internet Marketing Unleashed by Podcasting
channel.description: Scott Paton, Author of Podcasting Unleashed, shares cutting-edge strategies for marketing your business online. Internet Marketing Consultant with 7 years experience working with small to medium size businesses and entrepreneurs. Looking to take your business online or start an Internet business? Email Marketing, Adsense, Adwords, PPS, SEO, Keyword research, copywriting, and backend sales are some of the topics covered in the Podcasts, past, present and future. Scott Paton will explain them all in easy to understand terms, plus how to use them in your business to get immediate results.
channel.itunes:subtitle: How to Use Powerful Podcasts to Instantly Drive a Hurricane of Massive Traffic to Your Web Site
channel.itunes:author: Scott Paton

item.title: Oprah Bombs Twitter | Internet Marketing Unleashed | Podcast #69
item.description: Is Oprah ruining Twitter? What is Google doing with its latest updates? What are employment sites REALLY doing with your email address? All this and more in today's hard-hitting episode. Internet Marketing secrets revealed in each and every episode. Listen closely as Scott Paton, the Dean of Blogonomics and Podology, shares with you the latest business-building, web traffic-exploding, power-profit news from the world of Internet Marketing. item.title: SEO Secrets Revealed | Internet Marketing Unleashed | Podcast #65
item.description: Scott and Mike discuss the basics of SEO: Meta Tags Title Tags Blogging Why you should use video and audio on your site Why you should be submitting your site's pages directly to Google Inbound links PageRank Why you need to think like a newspaper journalist How often should you post to your blog And much more. Internet Marketing secrets revealed in each and every episode. Listen closely as Scott Paton, the Dean of Blogonomics and Podology, shares with you the latest business-building, web traffic-exploding, power-profit news from the world of Internet Marketing.
